In order to send mail through Mailspring: No ka hoʻounaʻana i ka leka uila ma o Mailspring, pono e loaʻa i kāu leka uila ka waihona Sent Mail. Hiki iāʻoe ke hōʻike i ka waihona ma kahi pūnaewele ma ka nānāʻana i nā makemake> Kōpili a kohoʻana i kahi inoa waihona mai ka papa koho koho.

Mailspring is independent %@ software, a: Loaʻa nā mailspring %@ pūnaewele, a me ka loaʻa kālā e loaʻa iā mākou ka mālama manawa a me ka hoʻomaikaʻiʻana i ka huahana.
